3.6.0-rc1.name: @joethefkingfrypan/sinon-chai
3.6.0-rc1.description: Extends Chai with assertions for the Sinon.JS mocking framework.

scripts.test-travis: npm install && npm install chai@$CHAI_VERSION && npm install sinon@$SINON_VERSION && npm test
